title: Allocation of Land to Ananda Collage, Colombo for a Playground and Re-	establishment of Chandra de Silva Ground at Rajagiriya
decision_details: - the proposal made by	H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Defence and Urban Development,	to revert the block of land more than 3 « acres in extent, situated at Rajagiriya, to the	Land Commissioner General, to enable him to handover the same on a Free Grant to	Ananda College, Colombo 10, for the development of a playground and to allocate	another block of land at Rajagiriya to the Sri Jayewardhenapura, Kotte Municipal	Council, for the ?Chandra de Silva Playground?, was approved by the Cabinet.
